author: Rich James
title: No bold new agenda: Albanese says he won’t utilise massive majority for big change
description:
The prime minister will use today's address at the National Press Club to refute speculation about a radical new agenda, and Tasmania looks like it might be heading to the polls for yet another election.
The post No bold new agenda: Albanese says he won’t uti…
content:
IF NOT NOW, NEVER?
As weve been documenting, Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has had the most extraordinary time of it since the country went to the polls a month or so ago. Today hes up at the Nati… [+16031 chars]
